Site.Name: Booru-on-rails

Regex.ImageTags: <span class="tag dropdown"(?: data-tag-category="([^"]+)")? data-tag-id="[^"]+" data-tag-name="([^"]+)" data-tag-slug="[^"]+">
Regex.Image: <div class="image-container[^"]*" data-aspect-ratio="[^"]*" data-comment-count="([^"]*)" data-created-at="([^"]*)" data-download-uri="([^"]*)" data-downvotes="[^"]*" data-faves="([^"]*)" data-height="([^"]*)" data-image-id="([^"]*)" data-image-tag-aliases="([^"]*)" data-image-tags="[^"]*" data-orig-sha512="[^"]*" data-score="([^"]*)" data-sha512="([^"]*)" data-size="[^"]*" data-source-url="([^"]*)" data-upvotes="([^"]*)" data-uris="[^"]*" data-width="([^"]*)">.*<a[^>]*><img[^>]* src="([^"]*)"\/><\/a><\/div>

Site.Modifiers: faved_by: width: height: uploader: source_url: description: sha512_hash: aspect_ratio:
